```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
knitr::opts_knit$set(root.dir = rprojroot::find_rstudio_root_file())
```

```{r}
load("data/clean_trends.RData")
```


```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(purrr)
library(lubridate)
library(fixest)
library(vtable)
```



```{r}
index_time_graph <- trends_data %>% group_by(monthorweek, high_income) %>% summarize(mean(index))

ggplot(index_time_graph, aes(x = monthorweek, y = `mean(index)`, color = high_income)) + geom_point() + geom_line() + geom_vline(xintercept = as.Date("2015-09-01")) + geom_smooth(method = 'lm')
```
```{r}
index_income_graph <- trends_data %>% group_by(`md_earn_wne_p10-REPORTED-EARNINGS`, high_income) %>% summarize(mean(index))

ggplot(index_income_graph, aes(x = `md_earn_wne_p10-REPORTED-EARNINGS`, y = `mean(index)`, color = high_income)) + geom_point() + geom_line() + geom_vline(xintercept = as.Date("2015-09-01")) + geom_smooth(method = 'lm')
```

```{r}
index_time_model <- feols(index ~ scorecard_exist + high_income + scorecard_exist*high_income + monthorweek,data = trends_data)
etable(index_time_model)
```
